purpose: Enhance software security testing by leveraging large language models to generate fuzzing inputs
principle: Utilizes LLMs to create diverse and complex test cases for fuzzing, improving the detection of security vulnerabilities
reusability: Designed to integrate with existing OSS-Fuzz setups, providing an API for custom fuzzing strategies
limitations: Primarily supports projects compatible with OSS-Fuzz, may require significant computational resources for effective LLM utilization
name: oss-fuzz-gen
highlight: Integrates LLM capabilities with OSS-Fuzz for enhanced security testing
